alert.note: Alert for Knox (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 1:50AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Antelope and southwestern Knox Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 150 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northeast of Ewing, or 17 miles northwest of Neligh, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Orchard around 200 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
